title: Your next job interview could be judged by AI. Here’s how to prepare.
description: AI is not just screening resumes anymore. It’s also conducting job interviews. Here's what to expect and how to do well in an interview with AI.

title: Amazon grew relentlessly. Now it’s getting lean.
description: After years of growth and expansion, Amazon is starting to slow down.

title: Twitter says parts of source code posted online, seeks leaker
description: Twitter's subpoena asks GitHub to identify a user named as “FreeSpeechEnthusiast,” who shared the code, and anyone who downloaded the code.
